category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEAlignmentNumberToSearch
preference.preference_description: Defines the number of lines to search for at a time in the Align Selected Lines dialog box in Manufacturing Process Planner. Valid Values: Any whole number. If a negative number is entered, the buttons for chunking the search results are disabled and the search results for all selected lines are shown.
